data.title: Pacifica, City of
data.text:
City Council

The City of Pacifica is governed by a five-member city council elected to four-year terms. The mayor is elected to a one-year term.

Council Member Term Ending Christine Boles 2026 Mary Bier 2026 Sue Beckmeyer 2026 Sue Vaterlaus 2024 Tygarjas Bigstyck 2024

The city council meets regularly the second and fourth Monday of every month.

All meetings are held at the Council Chambers, 2212 Beach Boulevard, Pacifica, CA 94044.

Meeting time is 7:00 pm unless otherwise noted in the agenda. Future agendas are posted at least 72 hours prior to regular meetings and 24 hours prior to special meetings.
